scripts.start: pnpm exec tsx watch --tsconfig=./tsconfig.json ./src/main.ts --projectTsConfig=../projects/1/tsconfig.app.json --declarationNames=useTicTacToeGameStore.var.tsx#useTicTacToeGameStore  --maxRecursionLevel=2 | pnpm exec pino-pretty
scripts.start2: pnpm exec tsx watch --tsconfig=./tsconfig.json ./src/main.ts --projectTsConfig=../projects/1/tsconfig.app.json --declarationNames=Board,Player.type.ts#Player --ignoreExternalDeclarations=false | pnpm exec pino-pretty
